multimedia.caption: The American poet Louise Glück, who was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature on Thursday.
The American poet Louise Glück, who was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature on Thursday.
The American poet Louise Glück, who was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature on Thursday.
The American poet Louise Glück, who was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature on Thursday.
The American poet Louise Glück, who was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature on Thursday.

“I assume that my struggles and joys are not unique,” said Louise Glück, who received this year’s Nobel Prize in Literature. “I’m not interested in making the spotlight fall on myself and my particular life, but instead on the struggles and joys of humans, who are born and then forced to exit.”
